verses.verse: Now there was <S%G2258><s%> a <S%G1161><s%> man <S%G444><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%>, named <S%G3686><s%> Nicodemus <S%G846><s%>, a ruler <S%G758><s%> of the Jews <S%G2453><s%>:

the same <S%G3778><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G2424><s%> by night <S%G3571><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him <S%G846><s%>, Rabbi <S%G4461><s%>, we know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> thou art <S%G2064><s%> a teacher <S%G1320><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> from <S%G575><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>; for <S%G1063><s%> no one <S%G3762><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> signs <S%G4592><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> doest <S%G1437><s%>, except <S%G3361><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> be <S%G5600><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Verily <S%G281><s%>, verily <S%G281><s%>, I say <S%G3004><s%> unto thee <S%G1437><s%>, Except <S%G3361><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> be born <S%G1080><s%> anew <S%G509><s%>, he cannot3756, 1410 see <S%G1492><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.

Nicodemus <S%G3530><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, How <S%G4459><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> be born <S%G1080><s%> when he is <S%G5607><s%> old <S%G3361><s%>? can he <S%G1410><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> a second time <S%G1208><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%>'s womb <S%G2836><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> be born <S%G1080><s%>?

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%>, Verily <S%G281><s%>, verily <S%G281><s%>, I say <S%G3004><s%> unto thee <S%G1437><s%>, Except <S%G3361><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> be born <S%G1080><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> water <S%G5204><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%>, he cannot3756, 1410 enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>!

That which is born <S%G1080><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> that which is born <S%G1080><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%>.
Marvel <S%G2296><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I said <S%G2036><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%>, Ye <S%G5209><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> be born <S%G1080><s%> anew <S%G509><s%>.

The wind <S%G4151><s%> bloweth <S%G4154><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> it will <S%G2309><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> thou hearest <S%G191><s%> the voice <S%G5456><s%> thereof <S%G846><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> knowest1492, 1492 not <S%G3756><s%> whence <S%G4159><s%> it cometh <S%G2064><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> whither <S%G4226><s%> it goeth <S%G5217><s%>: so <S%G3779><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> one that is born <S%G1080><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%>.
Nicodemus <S%G3530><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, How <S%G4459><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> be <S%G1096><s%>?

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Art <S%G1488><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> the teacher <S%G1320><s%> of Israel <S%G2474><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> understandest <S%G1097><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%>?

Verily <S%G281><s%>, verily <S%G281><s%>, I say <S%G3004><s%> unto thee <S%G3754><s%>, We speak <S%G2980><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> which we know <S%G1492><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> bear witness <S%G3140><s%> of that <S%G3739><s%> which we have seen <S%G3708><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> ye receive <S%G2983><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> witness <S%G3141><s%>.

If <S%G1487><s%> I told <S%G2036><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> earthly things <S%G1919><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ye believe <S%G4100><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>, how <S%G4459><s%> shall ye believe <S%G4100><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> I tell <S%G2036><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> heavenly things <S%G2032><s%>?

And <S%G2532><s%> no one <S%G3762><s%> hath ascended <S%G305><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> heaven <S%G1487><s%>, but <S%G3361><s%> he that <S%G3588><s%> descended <S%G2597><s%> out <S%G1537><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%>, even the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%>, who is <S%G5607><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> lifted up <S%G5312><s%> the serpent <S%G3789><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the wilderness <S%G2048><s%>, even so <S%G3779><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> be lifted up <S%G5312><s%>;
that <S%G2443><s%> whosoever <S%G3956><s%> believeth <S%G4100><s%> may in <S%G1519><s%> him <S%G846><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life <S%G2222><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> loved <S%G25><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%>, that <S%G5620><s%> he gave <S%G1325><s%> his <S%G846><s%> only begotten <S%G3439><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> whosoever <S%G3956><s%> believeth <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> him <S%G846><s%> should <S%G622><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> perish <S%G622><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life <S%G2222><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the <S%G846><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> judge <S%G2919><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> should be saved <S%G4982><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

He that believeth <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> him <S%G846><s%> is <S%G2919><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> judged <S%G2919><s%>: he <S%G1161><s%> that believeth <S%G4100><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> hath been judged <S%G2919><s%> already <S%G2235><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> he hath <S%G4100><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of the only begotten <S%G3439><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the judgment <S%G2920><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> the light <S%G5457><s%> is come <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> men <S%G444><s%> loved <S%G25><s%> the darkness <S%G4655><s%> rather <S%G3123><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> the light <S%G5457><s%>; for <S%G1063><s%> their <S%G846><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> evil <S%G4190><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> one that doeth <S%G4238><s%> evil <S%G5337><s%> hateth <S%G3404><s%> the light <S%G2532><s%>, and cometh <S%G2064><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> the light <S%G2443><s%>, lest <S%G3361><s%> his <S%G846><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> should be reproved <S%G1651><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> he that doeth <S%G4160><s%> the truth <S%G225><s%> cometh <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> the light <S%G5457><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> his <S%G846><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> may be made manifest <S%G5319><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> they have <S%G2076><s%> been wrought <S%G2038><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>.

After <S%G3326><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the land <S%G1093><s%> of Judea <S%G2453><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> he tarried <S%G1304><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> baptized <S%G907><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> baptizing <S%G907><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Enon <S%G137><s%> near <S%G1451><s%> to Salim <S%G4530><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> there was <S%G2258><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> water <S%G5204><s%> there <S%G1563><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> they came <S%G3854><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> were baptized <S%G907><s%>.
For <S%G1063><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> not yet <S%G3768><s%> cast <S%G906><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> prison <S%G5438><s%>.

There arose <S%G1096><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> a questioning <S%G2214><s%> on the part <S%G3326><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> John <S%G2491><s%>'s disciples <S%G3101><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> a Jew <S%G2453><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> purifying <S%G2512><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they came <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> John <S%G2491><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him <S%G846><s%>, Rabbi <S%G4461><s%>, he <S%G3739><s%> that was <S%G2258><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> thee <S%G4675><s%> beyond <S%G4008><s%> the Jordan <S%G2446><s%>, to whom <S%G3739><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> hast borne witness <S%G3140><s%>, behold <S%G1492><s%>, the same <S%G3778><s%> baptizeth <S%G907><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men come <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

John <S%G2491><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%>, A <S%G3756><s%> man <S%G444><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> receive <S%G2983><s%> nothing <S%G1437><s%>, except <S%G3361><s%> it have been <S%G5600><s%> given <S%G1325><s%> him <S%G846><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>.

Ye <S%G5210><s%> yourselves <S%G846><s%> bear <S%G3140><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> witness <S%G3140><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> I said <S%G2036><s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the Christ <S%G5547><s%>, but <S%G235><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> him <S%G1565><s%>.

He that hath <S%G2192><s%> the bride <S%G3565><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the bridegroom <S%G3566><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> the friend <S%G5384><s%> of the bridegroom <S%G3566><s%>, that standeth <S%G2476><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> heareth <S%G191><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, rejoiceth <S%G5463><s%> greatly <S%G5479><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of the <S%G5456><s%> bridegroom <S%G3566><s%>'s voice <S%G5456><s%>: this <S%G3778><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> is made full <S%G4137><s%>.
He <S%G1565><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> increase <S%G837><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G1691><s%> must decrease <S%G1642><s%>.

He that cometh <S%G2064><s%> from above <S%G509><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> above <S%G1883><s%> all <S%G3956><s%>: he that is <S%G5607><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> he speaketh <S%G2980><s%>: he that cometh <S%G2064><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> above <S%G1883><s%> all <S%G3956><s%>.

<S%G2532><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> he hath seen <S%G3708><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> heard <S%G191><s%>, of that <S%G5124><s%> he beareth witness <S%G3140><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%> receiveth <S%G2983><s%> his <S%G846><s%> witness <S%G3141><s%>.
He that hath received <S%G2983><s%> his <S%G846><s%> witness hath set his <S%G846><s%> seal <S%G4972><s%> to this <S%G3754><s%>, that God <S%G2316><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> true <S%G227><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> he whom <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> hath sent <S%G649><s%> speaketh <S%G2980><s%> the words <S%G4487><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> he <S%G2316><s%> giveth <S%G1325><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> measure <S%G3358><s%>.
The Father <S%G3962><s%> loveth <S%G25><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> hath given <S%G1325><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> into <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%>.

He that believeth <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life <S%G2222><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> he that obeyeth not <S%G544><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> shall <S%G3700><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> see <S%G3700><s%> life <S%G2222><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> the wrath <S%G3709><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> abideth <S%G3306><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.
